summary: Encapsulates a comprehensive set of visual parameters for rendering quantum circuit diagrams, offering default values for colors, fonts, dimensions, margins, and custom text/color mappings that can be overridden by predefined themes or user‑provided JSON files.
business_intent: Provides a centralized, easily configurable style definition that ensures consistent and customizable appearance of circuit visualizations across different output formats (Matplotlib, LaTeX), supporting both built‑in themes and user‑defined styles for clearer presentation and documentation.
